view_nc.pro

00001 pro view_nc 
00002 
00003     cdfId   = ncdf_open ( 'phillips_nstx3.5.2.nc', /noWrite )
00004     glob    = ncdf_inquire ( cdfId )
00005 
00006     ;   Print some info about the netcdf file
00007 
00008     print
00009     print, 'Dimensions: ', glob.ndims
00010     
00011     for i=0,glob.ndims-1 do begin
00012 
00013         ncdf_dimInq, cdfId, i, name, size_
00014         
00015         if i eq glob.recdim then $
00016             print, name, size_, '(Unlimited dim)' $
00017         else $
00018             print, name, size_
00019     endfor
00020 
00021     print
00022     print, 'Variables:'
00023     for i=0,glob.nvars-1 do begin
00024 
00025         info    = ncdf_varInq ( cdfId, i )
00026         fmtStr = '(A," (",A," ) Dimension Ids = [ ", 10(I0," "),$)'
00027         print, format= fmtStr, info.name, info.datatype, info.dim[*]
00028         print, ']'
00029 
00030         for j=0,info.natts-1 do begin
00031         
00032             attname = ncdf_attname ( cdfId, i, j )
00033             ncdf_attget, cdfId, i, attname, attvalue
00034             print, 'Attribute ', attname, '=', string ( attvalue )          
00035         
00036         endfor
00037     
00038     endfor
00039 
00040 stop
00041 end
